professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Administrator with expertise in performance tuning, database optimization, and large-scale data warehouse management using SSIS and ETL processes. Proficient in transactional replication, high-availability solutions (log shipping, mirroring), and database design.

key_responsibilities: Monitored and maintained SQL Server 2012/2008R2 environments on Windows Server 2012R2.
Implemented high-availability features such as log shipping
Administered SQL Server 2005/2008 environments on Windows Enterprise Server.
Monitored performance and resolved issues related to memory
Developed and maintained OLAP solutions for data warehouses.
Optimized SQL queries to improve performance and reduce resource usage.
Collaborated with DBAs to ensure smooth database operations.
